title: Aishen Qiaokeli-ing...II
original_name: 爱神巧克力 ING... 2 期
opening_song: "Aishen Qiaokeli Jinxing Shi (爱神巧克力进行时)" by Wu Jiaying
ending_song: "Huakai Shijie (花开时节)" by Wu Jiaying
sinopse: Jiang Hao Yi, a normal, high school student who is extremely scared of getting into trouble, suddenly becomes the Harem King of his school when a bunch of beautiful girls confess to him! Unfortunately for Jian Hao, he doesn't know any of the girls who have confessed to him... What on Earth is happening?
